threat: If the user were  tricked into opening a specially crafted page, an attacker could exploit  these to cause a denial of service via application crash, or potentially  execute code with the privileges of the user invoking Firefox.

With cross-site scripting  vulnerabilities, if a user were tricked into viewing a specially crafted  page, a remote attacker could exploit this to modify the contents or steal  confidential data within the same domain.
